name: Puzl
overview:
Puzl is a free website builder for small and medium businesses.

Based on a drag and drop technology coupled with widgets, it gives the possibility for all to easily create and fully customize a free professional site.

Building a website with Puzl is 100% free. A business member, called a Puzlist has no limitation of size, storage, traffic or products while building his website.

The design picking interface is separated into three levels to increase the available combinations of choices. While building his site, a member is invited to pick a general design theme, a set of colors adapted to his theme, and a full website template which is in effect an organization of widgets and photos for his website. A dynamic preview is available to view the result of the selected combination.

The aim of Puzl is to help business increase their online visibility in search engines but also main social media.

You may view the features of Puzl for more information.

http://puzl.com/en/website-features
